title: How to Prevent Cut Flowers Becoming Smelly

steps.headline: Change the water regularly.
steps.description: This removes the older water more prone to smelling and replenishes the flowers with fresh water.

steps.headline: Wash the vase with warm, soapy water before adding the new water.
Discard any dead flowers at the same time.

text: Change the water regularly. This removes the older water more prone to smelling and replenishes the flowers with fresh water. Wash the vase with warm, soapy water before adding the new water.  Discard any dead flowers at the same time.
